page.name: Monastery
page.description: After your dragon was purified, for a split second it seemed like they have transformed into a human-like form. Maybe Elysia can help shed some light on this situation.

properties.name: Monastery
properties.description: After your dragon was purified, for a split second it seemed like they have transformed into a human-like form. Maybe Elysia can help shed some light on this situation.
properties.complete: Even though your dragon has not unlocked their shapeshifting abilities, they have unlocked something else: acceptance!
